name: Candy Coated Pretzels
author: JOYCEINDAYTON
summary: Wonderful candied pretzel twists that your family and friends will enjoy.
directions: Preheat an oven to 250 degrees F (120 degrees C)
Arrange pretzels in a single layer baking sheet
Combine butter, brown sugar, corn syrup, and salt in a large saucepan
Bring to a boil over medium-high heat
Do not stir once the sugar syrup begins to boil
Heat to 244 degrees F (117 degrees C), or until a small amount of syrup dropped into cold water forms a firm but pliable ball
Pour hot mixture over pretzels; toss to coat evenly
Bake pretzels in preheated oven for 10 minutes
Stir; continue to bake until crisp, about 10 minutes
Remove from oven and break into individual pieces
Cool on wire rack or parchment paper
